Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Grace.
ShortDescription: Revised: 85 Central buses temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison & Central, due to street blockage near Central/Grace

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison then resume their normal route at Central, due to street blockage near Central/Grace.

Allow extra travel time.
